ing: 3 tablespoons additional heavy cream for topping
des: "This is the easiest lemon dessert I have ever made, it uses only three ingredients and will always impress guests."
ins: In a saucepan, stir together 3 cups of cream and sugar. Bring to a boil, and cook for 2 to 3 minutes. Stir in the lemon juice. Pour into serving glasses, and refrigerate until set, about 5 hours. Pour a little more cream over the tops just before serving.
